Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
trends: There have been no other sightings in Compton
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: A bright light in the peripheral vision. At first I thought it was a geosynchronous satellite, but then noticed the light dim then pause in its path and pulsate. then it was joined by a second light on a similar flight path. Both lights hovered.
divs: Sighting DetailsI noticed a bright light in my peripheral vision. As I looked I notice the light dim and travel south west over the Guildford area. I thought at first it was a geosynchronous satellite, until I noticed a decrease in speed and a pulsating light. The light then hovered in place an appear to moving in a small circle. A few minutes later a second light on the same flight path also bright at first. My Land lady joined me after I called out to her when noticing the odd behavior of the first light and she noticed the second light. 2 plans where flying over head and as a point of reference, they where not the same. The lights where too high to be a plane and the flight path to erratic to be a satellite. The total observation lasted about 3 minutes until both lights dimmed out of view. Last direction seen traveling was in the south east direction.
